quote: There are so many soulful singers, even the ones coming from London, like Adele and Jessie J, who are just amazing. It feels like a really cool time to be making music now.
author: Britney Spears

quote: I'm definitely picky about what projects I take on. They have to be things I'm passionate about. I actually get to be creative when it comes to my mobile game. It's really cool.
author: Britney Spears

quote: I would love to act. I would love to do movies. If it was the right part, it would be really cool... I love funny movies.
author: Britney Spears

quote: You don't have to be a certain thing to be cool. If you're white, you don't have to act black or whatever. Just be you and know who you are.
author: Wiz Khalifa

quote: It looks good when you see someone kicking at the age of 51 with no double. It's kinda cool for people to know that past 50 we can keep flexible.
author: Jean-Claude Van Damme

quote: I didn't want to be a genius! That ain't cool.
author: Missy Elliott

quote: I don't need to come back to Wimbledon every year because I can't live without it. I'd be totally cool without tennis.
author: Roger Federer

quote: In the off season, you work out for two hours a day, and then you got all this other time off. I like doing other stuff. Football obviously isn't going to last a lifetime either, so it's always cool to get in front of a camera, do commercials, and do endorsements for products that you love.
author: Rob Gronkowski

quote: You just have to play it cool. You don't want everyone to know you're an amateur.
author: Shawn Mendes

quote: Crunches are much more effective than regular sit-ups because they specifically target your upper abdominal muscles rather than your hip muscles. If you're not used to them, they can cause soreness a day or two later, but it's a 'cool' soreness. A badge of honor.
author: Sylvester Stallone

quote: Doing graphic novels is cool! It's fun! You get to write something, and then see it visually page by page, panel by panel, working with the artist, you get to see it fleshed out.
author: Anthony Bourdain

quote: And of course I've got kids of my own now, and they love me being in the Harry Potter films. I'm now part of a phenomenon. You become incredibly cool to your kids, and you get a young fan base. So you became the cool dad at school. You're suddenly hip.
author: Gary Oldman

quote: I grew up not really having anything, so the idea that I can take care of my family and my friends now is a really cool bonus.
author: Katy Perry

quote: 'Jack & Diane' was originally about race. I was playing nightclubs, and I was seeing new American couples, mixed-race couples. I thought it was cool. The song was my effort to make a song about that, but of course the record-company guy didn't like it.
author: John Mellencamp

quote: I'm not saying I look cool, but every single time I go onstage, it is a fail if I don't feel like I'm going to pass out at least twice.
author: Kesha

quote: If my eyebrows are cool, if my eyeliner is popping, if I'm moisturized, then I can pretty much wear whatever I want. I think if your hair and your face are together, I think it's pretty much polished!
author: Kehlani

quote: I was in art school, and we had all these random classes. We'd listen to a lot of Bollywood. I'd listen to Spanish music - and I don't even speak Spanish, but Hector Lavoe is amazing - we listened to French music like Edith Piaf. She's tight. I like cool vocal inflections; I like cool sounds. I pretty much listen to anything I think is good.
author: Kehlani

quote: I think my main two songs are 'FWU' and 'Get Away.' 'FWU' made a cool point because it came out right after Chris Brown's 'Loyal' came out. I combated it with 'FWU,' a song that basically says, 'These women are loyal.'
author: Kehlani

quote: I'm from Iowa, we don't know what cool is!
author: Ashton Kutcher

quote: The thing about stand-up was, I was doing all this sketch and YouTube stuff where I was not being censored and I got to do my own thing, and it was really cool.
author: Donald Glover

quote: In my 30s, it wasn't cool to like Pauly Shore movies. It was cool to like them when they came out, then it wasn't cool.
author: Pauly Shore

quote: If I'm the biggest artist in the world, cool, but I want to just be me.
author: Future

quote: I try to look cool. I strategize. Sometimes it's like - that's part of the strategizing, to make it seem like I don't think about it.
author: Future

quote: The best merchants in the world aren't the ones predicting what's cool next; we're the ones dictating what's cool next.
author: Kevin Plank

quote: Pink is my favourite colour. I used to say my favourite colour was black to be cool, but it is pink - all shades of pink. If I have an accessory, it is probably pink.
author: Roxane Gay

quote: It's just really cool to go to countries and play festivals for people who don't really know your band or don't ever get to see it. It's really nice.
author: Brendon Urie

quote: Halsey's a really great artist - her voice is great, and she has a really cool message behind her songs.
author: Brendon Urie

quote: I used to study 'Hunky Dory' - and be mad that I hadn't figured out anything that cool!
author: Brendon Urie

quote: It's not really a popular consensus to sing Sinatra - which I love! And I just think it's so cool that he disliked rock n' roll so much.
author: Brendon Urie

quote: Summer bachelors, like summer breezes, are never as cool as they pretend to be.
author: Nora Ephron

quote: That is who Barack Obama is - a person of admirable character - and that is who he has remained for me over these last four years. I have not agreed with his every decision, but never once have I seen him break his cool, lose his composure, or abandon his insightful perspective - even during the most serious and/or absurd national disasters.
author: Elizabeth Gilbert

quote: And we have a little herb garden, which survived the winter thanks to global warming. It makes me feel like a cool, old Italian housewife, that I kept my rosemary alive outside all winter.
author: Elizabeth Gilbert

quote: The reason why I am proud of my part in the punk movement is that I think it really did implant a message that was already there. The hippies told it to me, but punk made it something cool for people to stand up for, which is that we do not believe government, that we are against government.
author: Vivienne Westwood

quote: Anything I get to wear to the Met Ball is huge. I'm not a fashion girl, so it's cool to be dolled up and have those diamonds where they send armed guards with you.
author: Chrissy Teigen

quote: I loved the world of roller derby because I thought it was such an empowering metaphor, that you get out there and do it. It's such a rocker, athletic, capable, cool exhibitionist sport; it's about this great sort of camaraderie.
author: Drew Barrymore

quote: I still, at hotel rooms, I do this one sort of not-so-cool thing: continually shoving my room service tray in front of someone else's door. Because I don't want the remnants. I don't want to be caught, like, being like the pig that I was at two in the morning.
author: Drew Barrymore

quote: I remember being on film sets when I was younger, and only men got to do the cool action movies. So I thought, 'Maybe I'll get to produce one day and get to do cool stuff, too,' which is what happened when we did 'Charlie's Angels'.
author: Drew Barrymore

quote: My mother used to dress rather risque when I was a kid, and that sort of shocked me. I always thought moms were supposed to wear cardigans and flats, but she was in leather bracelets and minidresses. In hindsight, it was pretty cool, but I'm probably more conservative because of it.
author: Drew Barrymore

quote: One of the biggest challenges we have, folks, is making liberty and freedom cool.
author: Rush Limbaugh

quote: So, it's cool that, yes, Hal Jordan is a superhero, but my character is a real-world hero in her own life.
author: Blake Lively

quote: If people could walk around in suits of energy, that would be cool. Other than that, I don't think men should wear spandex.
author: Blake Lively

quote: The one person who's disappeared out of the business is the A&R man. Because the listener at home becomes the A&R man. He's the one who chooses what tracks he wants on the album. And that's cool.
author: Jimmy Page

quote: It's a trend to insult Wale, like that makes you cool on the Internet, and a part of it is because I respond.
author: Wale

quote: My parents were really, really cool about supporting what I wanted to do at a really young age. I think I was about 10 when I caught the bug. They would drive me down to New York if there were auditions. When I was 12, I did this show on Broadway called 'High Society,' so we moved to New York for the run of that.
author: Anna Kendrick

quote: I feel like you can't get an audience to like your character if she's actually cool, but you can if she's trying to be cool and sometimes fails.
author: Anna Kendrick

quote: My mom was really cool.
author: Ryan Gosling

quote: I remember really loving the CoverGirl ads when I was younger - there was something very cool about how they always put the girls in white. It looked so clean.
author: Christie Brinkley

quote: Most of my guitars have been instruments that look cool. I'm not picky. I never think, 'Oh, this neck isn't made of ebony,' or, 'These strings don't feel correct.' It doesn't matter too much.
author: James Hetfield

quote: My style is pretty clean, classic, and elegant, with some elements to make it a little funkier. If you see me on a normal day, I'm usually in a T-shirt and jeans, maybe with some cool sneakers, but I'm pretty basic.
author: John Legend

quote: I came from a crew, and to me, all the guys I rapped with were better than me, so I was surprised when I was the breakout one. It was definitely a cool thing.
author: Queen Latifah

quote: My mom was my main influence growing up, and Phylicia Rashad reminded me a lot of my mother, just the way she handled certain things, she was... not soft-spoken but smooth-spoken. Just very calm, cool, collected about things.
author: Queen Latifah

quote: I'm cool with myself. If I can't have the body of Angie Bassett, so be it.
author: Queen Latifah

quote: When I'm wearing too-high heels and swaying my hips, I do that Sharon Stone kind of thing - she has the sexiest walk, a New York cool thing that throws you back.
author: Queen Latifah

quote: You know, the diversity that America has is so special. It's starting to really become a cool thing for young people.
author: Russell Simmons

quote: On Twitter, there'll be fans of 'Army Wives' and people who say, 'I've been following you since 'Supernatural,' I loved you on 'Person of Interest,'' and it's really cool to get that love. To them, I'm not just an overnight success.
author: Sterling K. Brown

quote: M. Night Shyamalan can draw quite a few people to quite a few things, and having the opportunity to work with him is very cool.
author: Sterling K. Brown

quote: It would be really cool to have my dad here to witness this, to see his grandchildren, to see this woman that I chose to share my life with, to just come walk on set and be like, 'Ah, this is how you make TV shows and movies.'
author: Sterling K. Brown

quote: I love the song 'El Rey.' And for years, I never knew what the song was totally about. It was something new for me. I'd never sung a song in Spanish before. Then I got the translation and saw what a really cool song it was.
author: George Strait

quote: How serious can a movie about time-traveling robots be? You want it to be cool and fun.
author: Christian Bale

quote: iTunes kind of feels like Sam Goody to me. I don't feel cool when I go there. I'm tired of seeing John Mayer's face pop up.
author: Trent Reznor

quote: 'Yeezus,' I really love it. I think the sound of it is cool.
author: Trent Reznor

quote: When your culture comes from watching TV every day, you're bombarded with images of things that seem cool, places that seem interesting, people who have jobs and careers and opportunities. None of that happened where I was. You're almost taught to realize it's not for you.
author: Trent Reznor

quote: I realized that if I don't like something, I can change it. If I don't feel comfortable with something, then I have a voice to say it's not cool.
author: Zendaya

quote: What is cool today is not going to be cool tomorrow, and what wasn't cool yesterday is going to be cool tomorrow.
author: Zendaya

quote: I once sang 'Summer Nights,' from 'Grease,' at a bar in Melbourne with John Travolta, who's a good friend of mine. He looked cool singing the part of Danny - sitting in an armchair, smoking a cigar - while I got stuck playing Sandy.
author: Hugh Jackman

quote: I don't want to judge, but I've also met women who think it's cool to be out or away from their baby, and I don't get that.
author: Kourtney Kardashian

quote: If your album sells, that's cool, more people find out about you, more people get turned on to what we're really about-which is a live rock and roll band.
author: Nikki Sixx

quote: An Oklahoma girl like me wouldn't even know how to be a diva. I'm just a person who has a cool job. I love to be at home. I rarely go to clubs... and I always wear underwear! I just know I'd fall down, and that's not for everyone to see.
author: Carrie Underwood

quote: It's pretty cool to see how far music can take you.
author: Luke Bryan

quote: I would like to be a heart surgeon or brain surgeon... something with that knowledge and the ability to save a life would be pretty cool. I wasn't that good in science class, though.
author: Luke Bryan

quote: I just cut songs I love and that represent what I want to say. And if it crosses over, that's very flattering. It's cool to know that with people listening to rock and rap, I'm sitting on their iPods along with that stuff.
author: Luke Bryan

quote: I think it's so cool to be tall. Even when I'm not wearing heels people tell me I'm tall and I always take it as a complement. The good thing is I can always see everybody in the room.
author: Maria Sharapova

quote: I recently discovered Artkive, a wonderful app that allows you to archive your child's artwork and create cool gifts like photo albums, mugs, mousepads, etc. It's very easy to use, and since Arabella is such a talented artist, I'm a pro!
author: Ivanka Trump

quote: I'm just trying to work out a way to be a singer and to create cool content. I'm willing to do that as an entertainer. But I'm not willing to give up my actual self.
author: Sia

quote: You were cool if you had on a pair of Air Force 1s. It's still a staple for me while on tour.
author: Bryson Tiller

quote: Michael B. Jordan is actually cool. He's like the homie. I'm actually talking to him. He reached out to me a while ago and just showing love for the music after 'TRaPSOUL' dropped.
author: Bryson Tiller

quote: We got to do a few things with President Clinton. To be invited to Washington again to play with Ashanti and all those other cool people there in front of President Bush and the rest of the world feels awesome. I'm really looking forward to going.
author: Darius Rucker

quote: I've been a Robert Randolph fan forever, since 2001. I just thought he was so cool; you don't see a black kid playing the slide the way he plays. No one plays like Robert.
author: Darius Rucker

quote: Awkwardness gives me great comfort. I've never been cool, but I've felt cool. I've been in the cool place, but I wasn't really cool - I was trying to pass for hip or cool. It's the awkwardness that's nice.
author: Marc Jacobs

quote: Sometimes it's cool to play major third and minor third diads back-to-back, or a minor third followed by a root/fifth diad - whatever combo sounds good.
author: Dimebag Darrell

quote: Some of my favorite harmonics are located between frets. There are two really cool ones between the 2nd and 3rd frets that I use a lot.
author: Dimebag Darrell

quote: Most bands don't make it past two albums and tours, if that. We pulled it off, and everybody's been happy and cool, but we got to the point where we knew it was time to take a break.
author: Dimebag Darrell

quote: The nerds are the ones that make the films and do loads of other really cool stuff in their life.
author: Daniel Radcliffe

quote: Manners are love in a cool climate.
author: Quentin Crisp

quote: I went to Northwestern because I had gone to a really nontraditional high school. I was like, 'It'd be cool to have a traditional college experience.' Then I was like, 'Oh, but none of these people understand what's cool about me. My specialness is not appreciated in this place.'
author: Zooey Deschanel

quote: Growing up in Hollywood meant there were a lot of film stars' kids at my school - but no conspicuous wealth. It wasn't cool to show off that you had money.
author: Zooey Deschanel

quote: It's cool cause my sister is older than me and we went to the same high school, so by the time I got to high school, I got the lowdown on all the teachers and everything.
author: Zooey Deschanel

quote: What is more important than the name is that people know that I really like acting, I enjoy it and I want people to know that I am serious. The name thing: I will always be L.L. Cool J.
author: LL Cool J

quote: All actors are my brothers and my sisters. It ain't cool to compare or disparage them. It ain't polite.
author: Michael Keaton

quote: I live in Brooklyn, in Williamsburg, so I just like to wander around. Williamsburg's such a cool little neighborhood community spot.
author: Zoe Kravitz

quote: I don't really go out, 'go out' that much anymore. I live in Brooklyn, in Williamsburg, so I just like to wander around. Williamsburg's such a cool little neighborhood community spot.
author: Zoe Kravitz

quote: It's superficial that people think I'm cool because I wear certain clothes and I have tattoos. The funniest part is, when they get to know me, they're always surprised by how nerdy I am.
author: Zoe Kravitz

quote: The one thing about art is you can't question it. Everyone is looking at everyone else to find out what's cool. No one knows what's cool.
author: Zoe Kravitz

quote: Obviously, you get to do a lot of great things and cool opportunities at the Super Bowl. But at the end of the day, we all want to be here as a player. That's the goal, and that's why I work so dang hard.
author: J. J. Watt

quote: Growing up, you'd see Michael Jordan on everything from Gatorade to shoes - everything. Obviously, that's something pretty cool for an athlete to aspire to.
author: J. J. Watt

quote: The one thing I know is, if I play good ball, things have tended to come along with it. Everything that I've ever done in my career has come off of playing good football. And so I realize I need to go out there, and I need to take care of my business; then everything else - all these cool, great things - come along with it.
author: J. J. Watt

quote: People always ask, 'Man, why don't you come out and enjoy it? Why don't you celebrate? Why don't you have any fun?' My fun is Sundays. Anybody can go to the club. You don't have to be good at going to the club to go to the club. You have to be good to be playing on Sundays, and to me, that's what's cool.
author: J. J. Watt

quote: I love that my fans are cool with me being lovey-dovey about my wife rather than pretending that I'm single and trying to act all sexy onstage.
author: Thomas Rhett

quote: If you're doing this because you feel like you have a burning desire to do it, then you'll find a way to do it, no matter what. If you're doing this because you're thinking, 'Hey, this will be really cool. I'll be famous. I'll be on YouTube,' then you'll probably quit, because it's not easy to do for the long haul.
author: Trisha Yearwood

quote: That's how I grew up - it wasn't cool to not have a good system.
author: Jimmy Iovine

quote: I always wanted to be where the cool was because I didn't think I was cool. But music was cool.
author: Jimmy Iovine

quote: I can't learn in school, but I can learn from somebody who I think is cool and great.
author: Jimmy Iovine

quote: I knew in my heart that I wasn't cool, but I figured I could at least be cool by association.
author: Jimmy Iovine

quote: I follow cool. When I went up to see Steve Jobs, I said, 'The party's at this guy's house.'
author: Jimmy Iovine

quote: Seeing young people caring about sound again and realizing that it's not cool to not have good sound, that means a lot.
author: Jimmy Iovine

quote: I'm usually really drawn to a song, and I know it would be good to cover if it sounds like something that I could write, or I wished I could write. Sometimes a writer just sounds like they're in your head, and that is really cool for me.
author: Lorde

quote: The world that I am coming from, hip-hop, is so regurgitated and repetitive that some people are used to that and they don't want change, they don't like change. And I get that, that's cool. Luckily for me, I'm confident in myself as an artist where I can do what I want, and as long as I'm cool with it, I'm cool with it.
author: Kid Cudi

quote: My mom is very close to me, and it has been really cool having a mom that's closer to my age because she can go out with me and stuff.
author: Lindsay Lohan

quote: Just everything that I've done, everything that I do, is to this day, all major decisions are all through prayer - all my actions, although a sinner, but you know what? I'm cool with that.
author: Terry Bradshaw

quote: I've always weaseled my way into Grammy parties to network and everything, but now I have a legitimate reason to be there - it's so cool.
author: Charlie Puth

quote: Being incarcerated is truly very serious, and it has changed my life to such an extent that breaking the cycle has become my sole focus. Jail is definitely not cool. Education is.
author: Ja Rule

quote: I'm always looking for cool stuff to do because that's what we're supposed to do, ya know?
author: Josh Homme

quote: If I was just in one band, I would have a problem with the amount of time between records because I don't want to wave one flag. I just want to be part of something cool.
author: Josh Homme

quote: Lonnie was ahead of his time, but at the same time he was right in there with Albert Collins's Cool Sounds.
author: Stevie Ray Vaughan

quote: For the better part of my adult life, I proudly avoided nerd/nimrod/goober status. I was always just cool enough.
author: Steve Carell

quote: The cool thing is that jazz is really a wonderful example of the great characteristics of Buddhism and great characteristics of the human spirit. Because in jazz we share, we listen to each other, we respect each other, we are creating in the moment. At our best, we're non-judgmental.
author: Herbie Hancock

quote: My mother used to take me to flea markets in my stroller, and I would just rummage through the piles. You've got to dig through the overstuffed racks that everyone else just walks by. It's the only way to find the cool stuff.
author: Lily Collins

quote: I don't like reading things that people say on the Internet because I know so much of it is not true. I don't want to waste my time worrying about what other people are thinking. I just want to focus on being able to do cool projects.
author: Lily Collins

quote: Cate Blanchett. Judi Dench. Helen Mirren. Everything about them. Even their fashion choices. They're so with it and cool and women I admire. They take chances. They're chameleons. Everything that they do. They're also amazing mothers.
author: Lily Collins

quote: You get a timeless cool card in New York.
author: Vin Diesel

quote: I've had fans do some pretty awesome things... I once had a fan do a mock proposal for me in Mumbai, inside a McDonalds... and I've had fans give me some precious things. I had one fan give me her mother's ring; I've gotten some pretty intense stuff. And I always get drawings and scrapbooks from fans, which is also pretty cool.
author: Lilly Singh

quote: I don't care if it's a white millionaire kid from Oxfordshire who comes to my show, buys my record, supports me and rates me. It's cool.
author: Stormzy

quote: I think all jocks have a sensitive side. It's just, will they show it to anybody? Will they let their guard down and stop being tough and the cool jock guy around their friends, or just relax? I don't know if it's best to say opening up, but just relax and really say what you're actually thinking, and not what you think people want to hear.
author: Channing Tatum

quote: Man, I love the 'Lord of the Rings' movies. Some people would say I'm weird for liking those types of movies, but they are so cool.
author: Robert Griffin III

quote: It's so cool, the number of emails I get from people saying I changed their life. It's pretty crazy.
author: Ella Woodward

quote: Reggae, oh man. It's the ultimate music. The positivity. The musicality. The whole cultural expressionism of it. The danceability. Just the cool factor. The melody factor. Some of it comes from a religious place. If there were a competition of who makes the best religious music, it would definitely be the Rastafarian reggae.
author: Lupe Fiasco

quote: Tracy Morgan is subdued. I'm cool. I'm chilled out.
author: Tracy Morgan

quote: Cool is the enemy of funny. You can't be cool and be funny at the same time. Only Eddie Murphy could do that.
author: Tracy Morgan

quote: A part of me wants to sort of try and sound cool and feed this myth that I'm some sort of glamorous lothario, but I was raised by women - my mother and her mother and my aunts - and as a result, most of my friends have always been women.
author: Moby

quote: I have met Jackie Chan about 6 times up 'til now... and even though many people think we are natural enemies, I personally think he is a cool bloke and would honestly love to work with him in a film one time - that would a well brilliant movie!
author: Jet Li

quote: I think I'm drawn to more villain-type characters, because it's so cool to get to say all the things you want to say. In Hollywood, you get to this position where you have to bite your tongue so much. You take all your experiences of not being able to say what you really want to say, and channel that through your character.
author: Gabrielle Union

quote: I have to stay calm, cool, and collected.
author: Canelo Alvarez

quote: From the R&B side, I've always been a huge Brian McKnight fan. He's just as talented as it gets vocally, and as a musician. I think it'd be real cool to do something with him.
author: Brantley Gilbert

quote: It's been cool to catch up, but I think I'm done with my exes. To be honest, I went out with flying colors on the majority of them.
author: Brantley Gilbert

quote: If you, like, consciously think about being cool, you're not cool. If you consciously think about being, like, different or original, you ain't different or original.
author: Junot Diaz

quote: I know what it feels like to have the door slammed firmly in my face, so I'm cool with that.
author: Mos Def

quote: I went to Catholic high school for half a year and religion wasn't the cool thing to talk about even at a catholic high school. It never came up.
author: Mandy Moore

quote: When I was a very young actor, I cruised around in a pretty cool vehicle called the Starship Enterprise.
author: George Takei

quote: I didn't know I was cool, but I was very flattered that some of the younger comedy writers came up to talk to me at the Emmys. I found that gratifying.
author: Bob Newhart

quote: The artists who stick around for a while are the ones who go, 'Oh, that's cool, never thought of that. Ought to do that.'
author: Brad Paisley

quote: My dad is Dominican, my mother's Puerto Rican, and I got into bachata at the age of 10 or 11. When I started listening, it had a reputation for being music for hick people. I thought that had to be changed. I was born and raised in the Bronx, and I knew you make something cool if you're cool.
author: Romeo Santos

quote: We have a really cool relationship because I talk to my son like he's my little homie. I try to be the cool dad, like, 'What's up? How many girls you have?'
author: Romeo Santos

quote: We aren't cool and never will be.
author: Chris Martin

quote: Being voted the world's sexiest vegetarian is about as cool as it gets. It's not quite as cool as Brad Pitt, but it'll do.
author: Chris Martin

quote: 'Cool' is detached and emotionally cool. My instinct is to battle anything that seems overly cool.
author: Oscar Isaac

quote: I wouldn't mind seeing The Smiths reform. That would be cool.
author: Oscar Isaac

quote: A lot of pop people out there are cool, but they overdo it.
author: Norah Jones

quote: We didn't do a square ball in 'Pong' because we thought it was cool. We did it because that was all we could do.
author: Nolan Bushnell

quote: The subtle generational cues that make one thing cool and another uncool aren't always obvious to a parent. My children are my dinner-table sounding board. I've come up with some wonderful ideas that they universally dismissed as 'lame.'
author: Nolan Bushnell

quote: There are a lot of things about having money that are perceived to be cool but that aren't. Maybe if you're a CEO jerk who likes going coast to coast by himself in a G4, then that's fine. But that's not me. And it never will be.
author: Nolan Bushnell

quote: I always loved both 'Breakout' and 'Asteroids' - I thought they were really good games. There was another game called 'Tempest' that I thought was really cool, and it represented a really hard technology. It's probably one of the only colour-vector screens that was used in the computer graphics field at that time.
author: Nolan Bushnell

quote: Satan will advocate that it is cool to doubt spiritual gifts and the teachings of true prophets.
author: Dieter F. Uchtdorf

quote: My parents are the coolest of the cool on every single level, and it's because they have a deep appreciation for every moment of their lives.
author: Rashida Jones

quote: In early high school years, I was pretty chubby, and I spent a lot of time on my computer, before it was cool to have a computer - because there was a time that was true. So that's where I developed my personality.
author: Rashida Jones

quote: I'm friends with a lot of my exes, but it took time. We didn't just get into it. I don't think you can be friends until you're cool with them dating someone else. That's when you know.
author: Rashida Jones

quote: I feel like it's improving a little bit as we go on, but I've never been to Lilith Fair. It always seemed so cool that it was started by women, for women, and it was a safe place to go and hear all of your favorite female acts in one space.
author: Maren Morris

quote: If we have a great idea, we'll go, 'Oh, this could be a cool movie.' Or really for us, it's more like, 'Oh, this is a really bad idea. Let's do this. This seems really stupid.'
author: Trey Parker

quote: Part of Obama's persona is self-reliance. He's calm; he's cool; he's self-possessed. In many ways, he has tried to define himself in opposition to Clinton's sometimes needy, often undisciplined, emotionalism.
author: Dee Dee Myers

quote: All I know is that I've ruled out wearing fairy wings. When I was nine I wanted to get married in fairy wings, and now I realize that's not cool anymore.
author: Isla Fisher

quote: I mean, there are some amazing storytelling being done on the small screen right now. That's what so cool about being in television right now. Studios, networks are starting to throw more resources, better writers, more production values... and to be part of that is awesome.
author: Ian Somerhalder

quote: At an event in Germany, I realised the organisers had 'The Great Escape' playing as background music to my test, and I just thought, 'It's really cool. I want that.' It is fantastic to ride to.
author: Charlotte Dujardin

quote: Some people are cool with the fact that their bodies bear witness to this great thing they produced, their children, and I understand that. But on a personal level, it makes me feel better that my breasts are not down to my knees when I'm undressed in front of my husband.
author: Patricia Heaton

quote: It is cool to see that the fashion world has really taken to 'Instagram,' but, again, it is one of the many examples of many communities, whether you are a chef, a skateboarder, a surfer, a skier.
author: Kevin Systrom

quote: At the end of the day, we all know what the Jordan logo means, and you can't take anything away from that. But it's pretty cool to have my own logo on a Jordan shoe.
author: Kawhi Leonard

quote: Being a drummer, I'm always like, 'Oh, that's got a funky beat. That's cool,' and I like to dance.
author: Tommy Lee

quote: I kept thinking, 'this must be the coolest job - I'd like to be a professional baseball player.' They were getting paid to play a game, and what a cool lifestyle that was.
author: Cal Ripken, Jr.

quote: For some, Into The Gloss is just a blog, and that's cool. For us, it's the connective tissue between us and you, and that has paved the way for the creation of a very different kind of beauty brand: Glossier.
author: Emily Weiss

quote: Glossier is really for anyone who wants to embrace the present and live in the now. It's about embracing constant change and who you are at any given moment, and that's often someone who's imperfect - and that's cool.
author: Emily Weiss

quote: I'm taking a lot of my favorite artists, different people, my favorite music and marrying that with what I do as a comic. It's very collaborative, arty, fun and cool.
author: Margaret Cho

quote: For 'Chungking Express,' the way we shot the film was all handheld and with all this existing light, and that became very popular. Everybody thought it was cool.
author: Wong Kar-wai

quote: Danger is cool.
author: Bryan Cranston

quote: People see my photos and think I labor over my image and I'm this cool, brooding artist. But I'm just having fun with it.
author: Lenny Kravitz

quote: For the last few years, it's been so chic for everybody to be miserable. Like if you're in with the cool crowd, you can't be happy.
author: Lenny Kravitz

quote: We found out the Gemini spacesuit was, well, oxygen was flowing to keep me cool as well as to breathe, and it wasn't good enough. My visor got fogged.
author: Eugene Cernan

quote: Mysterious can be cool, if you're in Hollywood and everyone's happy. But it can be really bad if people perceive that the financial interests are adversarial, that there's money versus people. A lot of Goldman Sachs people went into government, so at a time when there's a distrust of institutions, some of that reflects on us.
author: Lloyd Blankfein

quote: In my school, people liked the gym teachers because they were the football or soccer coaches. But look, if they're cool, they get respect.
author: Danny McBride

quote: I think it's important that we have strong, female characters in movies now, which can really leave an impression on people - especially young people - and that they're not 'sexy' or 'cool.'
author: Saoirse Ronan

quote: I don't eschew autobiographical writing, but I'm not interested in mine to be so straightforward. The things that tend to move me the most are often those that I have to figure out its meaning for myself. The human being's ability to make a metaphor to describe a human experience is just really cool.
author: Aimee Bender

quote: The truth is, we have this idea that late night is about creativity and being cool, but that's not our job. Our job is to get as many people watching the commercials in between our show. That's the reality of it.
author: Jimmy Kimmel

quote: I have, I admit, a low tolerance for detached chronicling and cool analysis.
author: Leslie Fiedler

quote: And not only that, I also have the MacBook Air which is really cool. Even my wife is jealous of my MacBook Air.
author: Karl Rove

quote: One of the things we joke about in the FPS development is it's so hard to get the player to actually bother to look at all the cool stuff you've been doing. You spend a lot of time making really cool things, and usually the player isn't looking where you want them to.
author: John Carmack

quote: I don't count on the boy who waits till October, when it's cool and fun, then decides he wants to play.
author: Darrell Royal

quote: We didn't understand irony yet in the '80s; we just kind of existed at face value, so there was no nerd cool yet because the digital revolution was still in its infancy.
author: Chris Hardwick

quote: Hip-hop is still cool at a party. But to me, hip-hop has never been strictly a party; it is also there to elevate consciousness.
author: Saul Williams

quote: It was cool for a couple of weeks, but how much bad golf can you play?
author: John Goodman

quote: I wouldn't mind doing my own film on the big screen. That'd be cool.
author: Kodi Smit-McPhee

quote: I liked Jackie Robinson because he was cool to watch, not because he was black. Every time you turned around, he was hitting a triple or making a great play in the field or, best of all, stealing home.
author: Cheech Marin

quote: We're always bombarded with images from magazines of what looks cool and sexy.
author: Marilu Henner

quote: I was the kind of reader in smudged pink harlequin glasses sitting on the cool, dusty floor of the Arrandale public library, standing at the edge of the playground, having broken a tooth in dodge ball, and lying under my covers with a flashlight.
author: Amy Bloom

quote: Maybe I am a little bit guilty of trying to convince myself that I am cool to this point - even today. But I am so much more healthy than I used to be in my twenties, because I was not accepted at all.
author: Donny Osmond

quote: I'm not too fond of really cool design. I've got quite kitsch taste really, in things like tableware. I'm quite a sucker for 1930s pressed glass.
author: Kevin McCloud

quote: I just tried to keep my cool and continue with my race plan: to win.
author: Mark Spitz

quote: One of the key factors of life is love, and the key factor of God is love, so having that understanding is really important in a relationship. Having someone that genuinely respects you and understands your life and is open to hearing about your life is really cool.
author: Sofia Richie

quote: Justin Bieber, I love to death. He's such a cool, ridiculous, much crazier kid in real life - more than he's really allowed to be, because he's a Unicorn and very rare.
author: Rob Dyrdek

quote: For a few months when I was about 17, I smoked a small cigar because I thought it looked cool and it would get me the girls. It didn't.
author: Jonathan Dimbleby

quote: I worked on heads-up displays, virtual-reality technology, and holographic displays - all sorts of really cool technology.
author: Mary Lou Jepsen

quote: When you get to your mid-20s, you start to feel responsibilities for the things that you do and the people around you. It's a cool age.
author: Eliza Dushku

quote: A lot of people are obsessed with looking cool. They feel they have to look after their image.
author: Adrian Edmondson

quote: Back in the day, I was a Royce Gracie fan and a fan of Tank Abbott. It's always the different-looking guys that you want to root for. Then there were guys like Mark Coleman and Randy Couture, so for me to get in there and fight against guys like that is pretty cool.
author: Brock Lesnar

quote: When I was in high school, I tried too hard to be cool and to impress people, but playing all these different characters has helped me find myself again.
author: Lucas Hedges

quote: Every collection that I work on, I always think, Is this cool enough to wear to a concert?
author: Anna Sui

quote: Okay - before I even had a baby, I would dream of the day I could make ponytails on my kid. I don't know why. I somehow got it in my head that it would be such a cool thing.
author: Constance Marie

quote: For me, everything is cool.
author: Paz Vega

quote: Country's hip; it's cool music.
author: Ricky Skaggs

quote: Apparently it's cool to watch The Daily Show.
author: Rob Corddry

quote: I don't need to hang out in a posse and try to act cool.
author: Jeremy London

quote: Growing up, I played 'Ken Griffey, Jr. Baseball' and just whatever I could get my hands on. When I was really young, I was a big fan of Mario and that type of stuff. I still play videogames now, so it was really cool for me to be able to play as myself on '2K6' or '2K7,' I believe it was, when I was a rookie.
author: Justin Verlander

quote: Sunday school don't make you cool forever.
author: Sly Stone

quote: I think I'm so old I'm in. We call it the 'Tony Bennett Syndrome.' For some reason, young people think I'm cool.
author: Bill Kurtis

quote: I think when you're winning, your uniforms are cool.
author: Shaun Alexander

quote: And in a world without heroes, as the movie trailer voice-over guy might say, the slightly awkward can be slightly cool.
author: Adam Brody

quote: If at any moment of the day I ever think I'm remotely cool at all, which is hardly ever, I have two daughters who make sure that never happens.
author: Pat Benatar

quote: Working with Angela Bassett is by far the best. I've watched and admired her for years. I'm very intrigued by her work. She's so cool. I still call her 'Mom' when I see her.
author: Lance Gross

quote: And every now and then people find the bugs, and they interpret those as cool failures in the Sims terms. For them it's like a treasure hunt, you know.
author: Will Wright

quote: I think you create your own hipness.
author: Peabo Bryson

quote: I don't really understand why people are so interested in me, personally. I'm just a curator. I'm just telling people things I think are cool.
author: Elise Andrew

quote: It feels quite cool, in a mad way, to be someone who skulks about in the shadows.
author: Peter Baynham

quote: Honestly, my entire childhood could be summed up with one word: Reader. I was always hunched over a book; in fact, I was the only kid in the world who got paler in the summer, because I'd sneak down into our cool, dank cellar and sit alone with a book for hours.
author: Kristan Higgins

quote: Glass really rewards risk. A lot of times with glass, you're just waiting for the piece to cool down or for some temperature to adjust, and there's split seconds where you've got a fraction of a second where you get to make a move a particular way, and you don't get to repeat it if you do it wrong.
author: Jim McKelvey

quote: If it was just me and Elvis one on one, which only happened once or twice in the times that I did see him, it was a really comfortable. He was a cool guy. Easy laugh, nice guy.
author: Mac Davis

quote: Ultimately, I think there's this umbrella term of jazz, and what's cool about not just what's happening with my music but this general sense of what's happening with this generation of musicians, is it's a very broad term, and we can incorporate all types of music, and we can be influenced and inspired by all kinds of sounds.
author: Gretchen Parlato

quote: My dad had such a cool job. When you're a voiceover actor, it's a whole different skill - you're bringing these huge, larger-than-life monsters and characters to life. And, also, you have to learn accents.
author: Ashley Bell

quote: People spend hours constantly checking and tweeting and Facebooking. And it's cool to check up on your friends and see what's going on in the world, but it's not cool to spend five hours of your day on the computer looking at the Internet.
author: Ty Segall

quote: A huge thing for me growing up was going to see my favorite bands and feeling like, 'Okay, cool, they proved themselves and did things in a special way.' That's the most important thing.
author: Kellin Quinn

quote: I've always loved movies and animation. When I was little, I was always pretending to be some alter ego superhero. For years it was Ultraman, ninjas, Spiderman and other cool super heroes.
author: Ryan Potter

quote: It's cool to have a well run, comfortable and inviting home.
author: Anthea Turner

quote: Horses are prey animals, and most of the other animals that I've shot are predators. If you act mellow with predators, they know that they can kill you, so they are cool, but if you work with prey, they think that you're going to kill them at any moment.
author: Jill Greenberg

quote: If I could work with any actor it would have to be Johnny Depp. He is cool.
author: Ben Nicholas

quote: I can have an accent and not have an accent, so it's really cool. I can play with it. I can be very Sofia Vergara, too, so it's really cool.
author: Eiza Gonzalez
